name: biological-machines-cloning
title: Biological Machines: Cloning
author: bradythehuman
description: Clones can be made in a biochamber and stored in dedicated tanks. Getting in a tank will fill the tank and open a respawn screen where the engineer can respawn at any filled tank or at the default spawn. Clones can be made with quality ingredients/modules and higher quality clones will have increased health, running speed, crafing speed and mining speed.
